Class Consumer

java.lang.Object
Consumer
public class Consumer
extends java.lang.Object
The Consumer class is to get information about a specific consumer.
Since:
2021-09-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adir Ben-David

      Constructor that initializes all the attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - holds the consumer's name
      streetNumber - holds the consumer's street number
      streetName - holds the consumer's street name
      city - holds the consumer's city
      postalCode - holds the consumer's postal Code
      age - holds the consumer's age
      gender - holds the consumer's gender
      m - holds the consumer's marital status
      e - holds the consumer's education level

      public Consumer​(Consumer c)
      Copy Constructor
      Parameters:
      c - c is an object of type consumer. It will copy the same attributes of a consumer to another consumer.

      m - consumer's marital status to set in type string Using the valueOf to convert string to the enum and also using the toUpperCase to make sure that it will work whether the user inputs it in caps or not

    • findConsumersBy

      public static void findConsumersBy​(Consumer[] c, int age, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String e)
      this static function will help us find all consumers that have the same age,gender and education
      Parameters:
      c - c is an object of type consumer
      age - it will find the consumers age for the requested age
      gender - it will find the consumer gender for the requested gender
      e - it will find the consumers education level for the requested education level

    • findConsumersByAgeNPostalCode

      public static void findConsumersByAgeNPostalCode​(Consumer[] c, int age, java.lang.String postalCode)
      this static function will help us find all consumers that have the same age and postal code
      Parameters:
      c - c is an object of type consumer
      age - it will find the consumers age for the requested age
      postalCode - it will find the consumers postal code for the requested postal code
